verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> that feareth <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that delighteth <S%H2654><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> in his commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> upon earth: <S%H776><s%> the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and riches <S%H6239><s%> shall be in his house: <S%H1004><s%> and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>

Unto the upright <S%H3477><s%> there ariseth <S%H2224><s%> light <S%H216><s%> in the darkness: <S%H2822><s%> he is gracious, <S%H2587><s%> and full of compassion, <S%H7349><s%> and righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
A good <S%H2896><s%> man <S%H376><s%> showeth favor, <S%H2603><s%> and lendeth: <S%H3867><s%> he will guide <S%H3557><s%> his affairs <S%H1697><s%> with discretion. <S%H4941><s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> be moved <S%H4131><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in everlasting <S%H5769><s%> remembrance. <S%H2143><s%>

He shall not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8052><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed, <S%H3559><s%> trusting <S%H982><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

His heart <S%H3820><s%> is established, <S%H5564><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> he see <S%H7200><s%> his desire upon his enemies. <S%H6862><s%>

He hath dispersed, <S%H6340><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> to the poor; <S%H34><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endureth <S%H5975><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> his horn <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%> with honor. <S%H3519><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be grieved; <S%H3707><s%> he shall gnash <S%H2786><s%> with his teeth, <S%H8127><s%> and melt away: <S%H4549><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>
